TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Series extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 表示要存放的資料點和系列屬性。

span.span: Represents the data points and series attributes to store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件代表一個資料數列，而且會儲存在類別。A object represents a data series and is stored in the class. A儲存物件，使用類別。A stores objects using the class. 它也會儲存的資料數列的屬性。It also stores attributes of the data series. 比方說，資料數列會有色彩屬性、 背景影像的屬性，背景漸層停駐屬性等等。For example, a data series has a color attribute, background image attribute, background gradient attribute, and so forth. 屬於一系列的物件也有自己的屬性。The objects that belong to a series also have their own attributes. 一般來說，如果相同的屬性設定資料點和其所屬的數列，資料點屬性的優先順序。Normally, if the same attribute is set for a data point and the series to which it belongs, the data point attribute has precedence. 在圖表中; 上不一定被繪製一系列它可以儲存用來執行的計算，從中建立並再繪製另一個數列的資料點值。A series is not necessarily plotted on a chart; it can store data point values that are used to perform a calculation from which another series is created and then plotted. 比方說，序列 A、 繪製時，可能會加在一起，系列 B 和 C 系列資料點的結果，但任一這些數列繪製。For example, Series A, which is plotted, may be the result of adding Series B and Series C data points together, though neither of these series is plotted. 若要繪製物件，屬性必須設定為名稱物件，用來繪製數列。In order to draw a object, the property must be set to the name of the object used to plot the series. 建立一系列時，它會自動指派給物件名為 「 預設 」 或 「 預設 」 物件不存在則為圖表區域集合中的第一個可用的圖表區域。When a series is created, it is automatically assigned to the object named "Default", or to the first available chart area in the chart area collection if the "Default" object does not exist. 若要停用一系列的顯示，將其屬性設為零長度字串。To disable the display of a series, set its property to a zero-length string. 屬性會決定將用於繪製此數列，如果它繪製的圖表類型。The property determines the type of chart that will be used to plot this series, if it is drawn.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: This must be a unique name; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的數列名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可用來建立的新執行個體類別。This constructor can be used to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此系列會是只能夠儲存一個 Y 值的物件。This series is only capable of storing objects that have one Y-value. 如果有多個 Y 值的資料點加入此系列中，將會擲回例外狀況。If a data point that has multiple Y-values is added to this series, an exception will be thrown. 若要在執行階段建立一系列，使用方法。To create a series at run time, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, int32 yValues) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, yValues As Integer)

param.name: name
param.span: 將建立之 物件的名稱。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 屬於這個數列之 物件所允許的 Y 值數量上限。

span.span: The maximum number of Y-values allowed for the objects that belong to this series.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和 Y 值的數量上限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and maximum number of Y-values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這一系列只能儲存沒有所設定的最大值的多個 Y 值的物件`yValues`參數。This series will only be able to store objects that do not have more Y-values than the maximum set by the `yValues` parameter. 如果您新增具有比最大值組的多個 Y 值的資料點，將會擲回例外狀況。If you add a data point that has more Y-values than the set maximum, an exception will be thrown. 若要建立在執行階段的物件`Add`和`Insert`數列集合屬性的方法也可用。To create a object at runtime, the `Add` and `Insert` methods of the Series collection property can also be used.

value.span: 用來繪製的數列的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一系列新增時在設計階段和執行的階段，它會自動指派給 「 預設 」物件或中的第一個可用的圖表區域如果"Default"不存在。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the "Default" object, or the first available chart area in the if "Default" does not exist. 如果您不想要繪製的數列，請設定此屬性為零長度字串。Set this property to a zero-length string if you do not want the series to be plotted.

summary.span: 取得或設定標示為空資料點之資料點的繪製樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing style of points marked as empty.

value.span: 標示為空資料點之資料點的繪製樣式。

span.span: The drawing style of points marked as empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定點標示為空的比方說，在的框線色彩，而在標記映像、 背景色彩或影像和其他等等的繪製樣式。The property determines the drawing style of points marked as empty, for example, in the border color, in the marker images, background color or images, and so forth. 某些屬性僅適用於特定圖表類型。Certain properties are only applicable for specific chart types. 比方說，屬性不適用於折線圖，但未套用至區域圖。For example, the property does not apply to line charts but does apply to an area chart. 若要顯示該影像表示空點，請使用並屬性，而非屬性。To display an image that indicates an empty point, use the and properties, and not the property. 屬性會決定空資料點的軸標籤。The property determines the axis label for empty points. 請注意，堆疊的圖表類型的座標軸標籤取決於的這個屬性設定的第一次繪製數列的屬性。Note that for stacked chart types, the axis label is determined by the property of the first plotted series that has this property set. 資料點可以手動標示為空 splittunneling屬性設`true`。Data points can be manually marked as an empty by setting the property to `true`. 或者，其中`InsertEmptyPoints`中的方法類別可用來檢查是否有遺漏的資料和遺漏的資料點時，插入空點。Alternatively, one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to check for missing data and insert empty points if a data point is missing. > [!NOTE] > 如果線條類型的圖表，是連接到空點的線條的線條色彩取決於屬性設定。In the case of line-type charts, the line color for lines that connect to an empty point is determined by the property setting.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，指出資料點索引是否用於 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether data point indices will be used for the X-values.

value.span: 如果屬於該數列的資料點的索引會用於 X 值，則為 ，如果不會，則為 。

span.span: if the indices of data points that belong to the series will be used for X-values; if they will not.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 數列中的所有資料點都使用循序的索引，而且如果此屬性是`true`則會以循序方式，繪製資料點，無論其相關聯的 X 值。All data points in a series use sequential indices, and if this property is `true` then data points will be plotted sequentially, regardless of their associated X-values. 這表示會有任何 「 遺漏 」 的資料點。This means that there will be no "missing" data points. 例如，假設有 1、 2 和 4 的 X 值序列中有三 （3） 的資料點。For example, assume there are three (3) data points in a series having X-values of 1, 2 and 4. 如果此屬性才有`false`，會在 x 軸位置標示為"3"中遺漏的資料點。If this property was `false`, there would be a data point missing at the X-axis location labeled "3". 不過，如果您將這個屬性設定為`true`、 三個資料點會繪製點 1、 2 和 4 中，依序，並會有任何遺漏的資料點。However, if you set this property to `true`, the three data points will be plotted at points 1, 2, and 4, sequentially, and there will be no missing data point. 標示為"3"的 x 軸位置不會出現在圖表上。The X-axis location labeled "3" will not appear on the chart. 當您不想有遺失資料點的間隔，您知道就不會有資料，例如週末，這非常有用。This is useful when you do not want to have missing data points for intervals that you know you will not have data for, such as weekends. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您要顯示多個數列，而且至少一個數列使用索引的 X 值，則所有數列必須都對齊 — 也就是有相同數目的資料點，而且相對應的點必須具有相同的 X 值。If you are displaying multiple series and at least one series uses indexed X-values, then all series must be aligned—that is, have the same number of data points—and the corresponding points must have the same X-values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一系列新增時在設計階段和執行的階段，它會自動指派，預設值給物件。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the default object. 如果您不要在圖例中顯示的數列，將此屬性設定為零長度字串，或是設定屬性設`false`。If you do not want the series shown in a legend, set this property to a zero-length string, or set the property to `false`.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 值，決定顯示資料點標記的頻率。

span.span: An value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 預設值為一 (1)。

span.span: The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定與顯示標記的頻率。The property specifies the frequency with which markers are displayed. 例如，如果您將這個屬性設定為二 （2)，每個資料點會使用的標記。For example, if you set this property to two (2), every other data point will use a marker. 這個屬性才會使用可使用 」 來啟用 「 標記屬性。This property is only used if markers are enabled using the property.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的調色盤。

span.span: Gets or sets the color palette of a object.

value.span: 列舉值，決定資料數列的調色盤。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines the palette for the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動將色彩指派給資料元素，如果資料點本身並沒有指派給他們的色彩，而且如果使用調色盤將資料資料點所屬的物件也沒有指派的色彩。A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them and if the data object that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果沒有數列或資料點明確指定的色彩，所使用的色彩取決於圖表類型的圖表控制項工具箱或數列的調色盤，如果指定的話。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the Chart control palette or Series palette, if one is specified. 請參閱下的表以取得詳細資料：See the table below for further details: |圖表類型Chart Type|使用數列的調色盤嗎？Series Palette Used?|顯示資料點色彩Colors Displayed by Data Points| |----------------|--------------------------|-------------------------------------| |任何形狀圖上 （例如，圓形圖和環圈圖）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|否No|從使用的第一個可用色彩控制項工具箱。First available colors used from control palette. 每個資料點的一種色彩。One color per data point.| |形狀圖以外的所有圖表。All charts except shape charts.|否No|從第一個可用的色彩控制項工具箱。First available colors from control palette. 每個資料數列的一種色彩。One color per data series.| |任何形狀圖上 （例如，圓形圖和環圈圖）Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|[是]Yes|從使用的第一個可用色彩調色盤。First available colors used from palette. 每個資料點的一種色彩。One color per data point.| |形狀圖以外的所有圖表。All charts except shape charts.|[是]Yes|從使用的第一個可用色彩調色盤。First available colors used from palette. 每個資料數列的一種色彩。One color per data series.| 這屬性的優先順序高於根目錄屬性物件，對於資料的顯示。This property has precedence over the property of the root object, with respect to the display of data. 附註： 如果`Palette`兩個屬性並物件設為 無並無色彩指派給相關的資料數列/資料點，而預設調色盤"BrightPastel 」 或用。NOTE: If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to None, and no color is assigned to the relevant data series/data points, the default palette "BrightPastel" or is used.

summary.span: 取得資料點的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of data points.

value.span: 資料點的集合。

span.span: A collection of data points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合屬性可讓您新增及移除一連串的資料點。The collection property allows you to add and remove data points to a series. 這個屬性也會提供方法和屬性，可用來操作這個集合，例如尋找執行的資料點，資料繫結等等。This property also provides methods and properties that can be used to manipulate this collection, such as finding data points, performing data-binding, and so forth.

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的陰影色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a series.

value.span: 系列的陰影色彩。

span.span: The shadow color of a series.

value.span: 預設色彩為 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定一個序列，它可以是任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 紅、 綠、 藍） 值的陰影色彩。Gets or sets the shadow color of a series, which can be to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可用來達到實際的陰影效果請嘗試使用陰影的色彩值的"128,0,0,0 」。The alpha value can be used to achieve a realistic shadow effect; try using a color value of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要實作一個陰影，將屬性為零 (0) 以外的值。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要實作的遮蔽功能，使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值會移到右邊的陰影。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 負值會導致移位至左邊的陰影。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的 X 軸類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-axis type of the series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列要使用主要 X 軸還是次要 X 軸。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines if the series uses the primary or secondary X-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對所有這類圖表水平方向的圖表以外的類型列，然後堆疊橫條圖和圓形圖、 環圈圖、 漏斗圖和金字塔圖等形狀圖，主要 x 軸永遠是較低的座標軸，用於次要軸是上方的軸。For all chart types except horizontally oriented charts such as bar and stacked bar charts, and shape charts such as pie, doughnut, funnel and pyramid charts, the primary X-axis is always the lower axis and the secondary axis is the upper axis. 橫條圖和堆疊橫條圖，主要 x 軸左側的軸，而次要 x 軸右的座標軸。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary X-axis is the left axis, and the secondary X-axis is the right axis. 當使用次要 x 軸繪製資料時，您必須使用屬性來設定軸屬性，而非屬性。When data is plotted using the secondary X-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定沿著 X 軸繪製的實值型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the value types plotted along the X-axis.

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of X-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定數列儲存的資料類型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 將此屬性設定為可讓 X 值輸入為的值，而不是。Set this property to to allow the X-value to be entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和時間值在內部儲存的.NET Framework值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values. 同樣適用於並的屬性物件。The same holds true for the and properties of objects. `IntervalType`軸標籤、 刻度和格線類別中找到的屬性會決定的間隔類型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. > [!NOTE] > 若要正確地套用所產生的資料點 X 值，使用軸標籤的格式屬性，這個屬性必須設定為。To correctly apply a format to axis labels that are generated from data point X-values, using the property, this property must be set to . 這個屬性也可用來判斷 X 值會繫結的資料類型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the X-values are bound.

summary.span: 取得或設定數列的 Y 軸類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-axis type of a series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列要使用主要 Y 軸還是次要 Y 軸。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines if a series uses the primary or secondary Y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定一系列會使用主要或次要 y 軸來繪製。The property determines if a series is plotted using the primary or secondary Y-axis. 針對所有圖表圓形圖、 環圈圖、 範圍橫條圖以外的類型時，橫條圖和堆疊橫條圖，主要 y 軸左側的垂直軸，而次要軸右垂直軸。For all chart types except pie, doughnut, range bar, bar and stacked bar charts, the primary Y-axis is the left vertical axis, and the secondary axis is the right vertical axis. 橫條圖和堆疊橫條圖，主座標軸是較低的水平軸，而次要 y 軸上方的水平軸。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary axis is the lower horizontal axis, and the secondary Y-axis is the upper horizontal axis. 當使用次要 y 軸繪製資料時，您必須使用屬性來設定軸屬性，而非屬性。When data is plotted using the secondary Y-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您新增有多個 Y 值的物件比這個屬性指定，將忽略過多的 Y 值。If you add a object that has more Y-values than this property specifies, the excess Y-values will be ignored. 必須以適當地顯示圖表的 Y 值的數目取決於選取的圖表類型。The number of Y-values that are required to properly display a chart depends on the chart type selected.

summary.span: 取得或設定數列所儲存之資料點的 Y 值資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of Y-value data in the data points stored by a series.

value.span: 列舉值，決定數列儲存之 Y 值資料的類型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of Y-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定數列儲存的資料類型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 這個屬性的值通常設定為或。The value of this property is normally set to either or . `IntervalType`軸標籤、 刻度和格線類別中找到的屬性會決定的間隔類型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. 這個屬性也可用來判斷 Y 值會繫結的資料類型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the Y-values are bound. 就可以繪製日期運算式做為值的資料點，但這很罕見。It is possible to plot date expressions as the values of data points, though this is rarely done. 如果您將這個屬性設定為，然後輸入做為 Y 值可以的值，而不是。If you set this property to , the Y-value can then entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和時間值在內部儲存的.NET Framework值。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values.
